metadata.title: Section 43 IT Act – Penalty for Damage to Computer, Computer System
metadata.text: If any person without permission accesses, downloads, disrupts or causes damage to a computer system or network, they shall be liable to pay damages by way of compensation.

metadata.title: Section 67 IT Act – Publishing Obscene Material in Electronic Form
metadata.text: Whoever publishes or transmits obscene material in electronic form shall be punished with imprisonment up to three years and fine up to five lakh rupees.

metadata.title: Section 505 IPC – Statements Conducing to Public Mischief
metadata.text: Whoever makes, publishes or circulates any statement, rumour or report with intent to incite public mischief or fear is punishable under this section.
